segments.text: I see the boy climbing on that stool, and it’s making me so nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely oblivious to the danger behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing, and it’s just getting worse by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, but she doesn’t seem to care that her brother might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and the boy is stretching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the puddle forming around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware she is of everything going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone does something before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
